title: Fix green check mark circle transparency

requirements.text: Remove the transparency/opacity from the green check mark circles in CheckInButton so the circle is fully opaque and does not allow any underlying content to show through.

quotes: There is a slight transparency on the green check mark circles. Make it so I can't see through it to the function below

acceptanceCriteria: The green check mark circle background is fully opaque with no visible transparency.
Content or UI elements beneath the circle are not visible through it.
The green color and check mark icon remain visually consistent with the existing design.

constraints: Do not change the size, shape, or icon of the check mark circle.
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Redesigning the check mark button or changing its color.
Modifying any other component styles unrelated to the transparency fix.
